sentences.sContent: The flag of China was raised on the summit of Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.sCn: 五星红旗插上了珠穆朗玛峰的顶峰。

sentences.sContent: Mt. Everest, also called Mt. Qomolangma, is the highest peak in the world.
sentences.sCn: 埃佛勒斯峰(也叫珠穆朗玛峰)是世界最高峰。

sentences.sContent: The Mount Qomolangma is situated between China and Nepal with 8848 meters high, which is the highest peak in the world.
sentences.sCn: 位于中尼边境的珠穆朗玛峰海拔8848米，为世界最高峰。
